name: Ten Funny Classics Quiz | Classic Movies | 10 Questions

questions.text: "Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid" is enormously enjoyable. One memorable scene has Newman and Redford atop a mountain overlooking a river while being pursued. What's the problem at the moment?
questions.explanation:
Sundance can't swim.

	"Are you crazy? The fall will probably kill you!"

questions.text: "The Sting" is Newman & Redford again, but it's too good to omit. How does Newman first meet the target (Robert Shaw)?
questions.explanation:
Card Game.

	On the train. Clever movie.

questions.text: Cary Grant was delightful in "Arsenic and Old Lace". How did his aunts poison their victims?
"Tootsie" was a very funny movie. Who played Dustin Hoffman's friend?
questions.explanation:
Bill Murray.

	Good early role for Murray.

questions.text: "The Fortune Cookie" was nicely done all the way around. What was the nickname of Walter Matthau's character?
questions.explanation:
Whiplash Willie.

	This Lemmon & Matthau entry may be better than "Odd Couple".

questions.text: "Pillow Talk" is the best known of the Rock Hudson & Doris Day comedies. It's not bad. Who plays Hudson's neurotic friend?
questions.explanation:
Tony Randall.

	No one whines like Randall - a preview of Felix Unger.

questions.text: "Sunday in New York" is cute, though its age is showing. Rod Taylor stars; who plays the female lead?
questions.explanation:
Jane Fonda.

	Nice support from Cliff Robertson and Robert Culp.

questions.text: "Teacher's Pet" stars Clark Gable and Doris Day and features a fine supporting job by Gig Young. Which one is the teacher?
"Some Like It Hot" stars Marilyn Monroe, Jack Lemmon and Tony Curtis -not too bad. Who was the director?
questions.explanation:
Billy Wilder.

	One of Wilder's classics.

questions.text: The same man who directed "Some Like It Hot" also directed Jack Lemmon (and Shirley Maclaine) in "The Apartment". Who played the "other man" in the romantic triangle?
questions.explanation:
Fred MacMurray.

	Nice job by Fred as a stinker.
